review: Great!  Would buy it again.  I am considering purchasing another for my other TV.

review: The fire stick was easy to install. It confused me because it is hidden behind the TV and I thought it had to be out front for the remote to work. That's on me. What I do not understand why I have to have both an Apple and a Fire Stick. You both have net flicks but different shows.  Can't there be  universal plug in?
author: Joy Walker

review: Great product for reasonable price.  Able to watch MLB.tv and HBO with no problems.
author: Benjamin J Weigel

review: Love it! I can choose everything on my amazon account with ease. It's fast, reliable andeasy to use. The only 2 drawbacks are that  the info for your selection is too small to read even on my large flat screen tv. And most importantly, i bought mine locally from Bestbuy amd it wad the same price as on my amazon prime account and I got it same day. Other than that it's awesome!
author: Saliba

review: Slow to process. I have wireless 5 feet away so it's not connection. Gets warm. Lags apps like YouTube. Oh, and now I get 20 emails asking me to rate "dora" because the kids watched it. A little disappointed on this one amazon.
author: seattle protection

review: I was a little concerned about buying this from reading the negative reviews, but I really love the firestick. I was sick of not being able to easily see my favorite tv shows or having to pay $2.99 to watch them, but with a prime membership I finally get to watch all those shows that are just not available on Netflix.  Keep in mind though, that this fire stick is ONLY worth it if you are a prime member.

review: Easy to install and works very well.

review: It is absolutely amazing and worth way more than it costs. We love it! The things you can do with it are so endless that I still haven't figured them all out. Love, love, love this product! We prefer using it over our smart tv!
author: Nikki W.

review: I find that the Amazon Fire Stick is a very nice product for watching innumerable media, it has a bit of a learning curve.  My complaint is mostly that streams either get interrupted or stop sometimes, especially if you are not close within a couple of feet from your wireless access point.
